name: Magical Contraptions
description:
We have made a game as a tribute to Storm P and Rube Goldberg. Embrasing all the small magical moments in everyday life. By making overcomplicated contraptions from everyday items.

Made for Nordic Game Jam 2020 Online

Music by davidjb.

Programing and design by ElbiBeck and nslindtner.

Sprites from Vecteezy.com and Freepik.com

Known bugs: music not looping and speeling errors.
